data.additional_notes:
#### SDHQ's Build Score Breakdown


This well-optimized game is baffling at how good it feels to kill some zombies on-the-go. Don't pass up on this one or I will become your nemesis.
- **Performance:** ★★★★★ (5/5)
- **Visuals:** ★★★★☆ (4/5)
- **Stability:** ★★★★★ (5/5)
- **Controls:** ★★★★★ (5/5)
- **Battery:** ★★★★☆ (4/5)
